label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_012
content:
## 2024-05-20 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 103
- Active: 99
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 15
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 4

### Enrollment by Dose Group
- Low Dose: 24
- Mid Dose: 26
- High Dose: 26
- Placebo: 27

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 75.3
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 16.4
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 122.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 199.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 130.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 33.6
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 130.2
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 30.3
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 211.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 317.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 216.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 48.7
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 180.8
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 38.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 276.6
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 420.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 298.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 75.0
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 18.4
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 6.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 32.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 33.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 23.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 4.0

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 49.7
- Erythema Percentage: 12.1
- Swelling Percentage: 14.6
- Induration Percentage: 7.5
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 35.1

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 15.1
- Fatigue Percentage: 23.5
- Myalgia Percentage: 31.6
- Headache Percentage: 22.5
- Chills Percentage: 10.3

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 6.1
- WBC (K) SD: 1.1
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 29.2
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 7.9
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 45.1
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 6.7
- Platelets (K) Mean: 246
- Platelets (K) SD: 39
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 5.5
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 0.9
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.5

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-1235, Description: myalgia, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1270, Description: malaise, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose

### Events
- Reactogenicity diary card collection rate: 94%
- Vaccination day 2: 19 subjects received scheduled dose

### Notes
- Week 12: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 103 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
